overview: You can't buy hardcore porno in England. It's the most sexually repressed country in Western Europe. So where does Rocco love to go to shoot videos ? Where does he find the kinkiest, most extreme men and women of porn ? In England of course! There the madman of porn is at his absolute psycho-sexual best. You get extreme kink!
tagline: Again Rocco raises the bar for his imitators
title: Rocco More Than Ever 2
